featured.text: Therefore, the race is on to find a cheaper, cleaner, and more energy-efficient way of desalinating seawater, and promising new findings are being reported. 49.
However, this cannot be treated as a trivial finding in science.
Which of the following is one of the findings of the study? (A)
The findings conclude that workers are actually most productive when the weather is lousy—and only if nothing reminds them of good weather.
What is the major finding of Dr. Begall’s study? (A) Cattle point north-south.

definition.zh_def: 發現或找到的行為或過程。
definition.en_def: The act or process of discovering or locating something.
definition.example: The finding of the ancient artifact changed our understanding of history.
